hints.content:
To find how long Dani walked, we can add the $\blueE{\text{Distance to friends house}}$ and $\maroonD{\text{Distance to the park}}$ together.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4bd7c7f0d0431a2e2293767a9ec61bd78d1c3149)

$\blueE{44}\text{ m}+\maroonD{54}\text { m} = \purpleD{\Box}\text { m} $

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4c6e5c466961fbed59bc20f2cd4aed14faad20b3)

$\blueE{44}\text{ m}+\maroonD{54}\text { m} = \purpleD{98}\text { m} $

question.content:
Dani walked $44\text{ m}$ to her friend's house. Then they walked another $54\text{ m}$ to get to the park.

**How far did Dani walk?**   

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] $\text{m}$
